info.description: Manage your DNS records with the VegaDNS API
info.title: VegaDNS API

canDeleteParam.description: Whether a group has delete access to a domain.  1 for true, 0 for false.
canDeleteParam.name: can_delete

canReadParam.description: Whether a group has read access to a domain.  1 for true, 0 for false.
canReadParam.name: can_read

canWriteParam.description: Whether a group has write access to a domain.  1 for true, 0 for false.
canWriteParam.name: can_write

distanceParam.description: Record distance, only for MX and SRV record types, defaults to 0
distanceParam.name: distance

emailSOAParam.description: Contact address, used only for SOA record type
emailSOAParam.name: email

expireParam.description: Expire in seconds, used only for SOA record type.  Defaults to 1048576
expireParam.name: expire

minimumParam.description: Minimum in seconds, used only for SOA record type.  Defaults to 2560.
minimumParam.name: minimum

nameserverParam.description: Primary nameserver, e.g. ns1.example.com, used only for SOA record type
nameserverParam.name: nameserver

orderParam.description: Order the results, can be 'asc' or 'desc', defaults to 'asc'
orderParam.name: order

perPageParam.description: Indicates the number of items per page
perPageParam.name: perpage

portParam.description: Record port, only for SRV record type
portParam.name: port

refreshParam.description: Refresh in seconds, used only for SOA record type. Defaults to 16374.
refreshParam.name: refresh

retryParam.description: Retry in seconds, used only for SOA record type.  Defaults to 2048.
retryParam.name: retry

serialParam.description: Serial number, used only for SOA record type
serialParam.name: serial

ttlParam.description: Time to live, defaults to 3600 for all record types but SOA, which has a default of 86400
ttlParam.name: ttl

weightParam.description: Record weight, only for MX and SRV record types
weightParam.name: weight

parameters.description: Search string to match first name, last name, or email
parameters.name: search

get.summary: Get a single API Key by ID

parameters.description: API Key Description
parameters.name: description

put.summary: Update the description of an API Key

parameters.description: Comma separated list of account ids to filter by
parameters.name: account_ids

parameters.description: API Key Description
parameters.name: apikey

parameters.description: Account ID to create the key for.  Default is the account id of the logged in user.
parameters.name: account_id

post.summary: Create a new API Key and Secret

parameters.description: Comma delimited list of domain ids to filter by
parameters.name: domain_ids

parameters.description: Field to sort by, can be one of 'time', 'log_id', or 'domain_id'
parameters.name: sort

get.summary: List audit logs, optionally filtering by domain_ids

parameters.description: Record type to filter on, can be one of 'A', 'AAAA', 'A+PTR', 'AAAA+PTR', 'NS', 'SOA', 'MX', 'PTR', 'CNAME', 'PTR', 'TXT', 'SPF'
parameters.name: filter_record_type

get.summary: Get a list of default records

post.description: You can use the wildcard placeholder DOMAIN in the 'name' parameter for the domain's name later, i.e. www.DOMAIN would become www.example.com for domain example.com.

parameters.description: Record type must be one of 'A', 'AAAA', 'A+PTR', 'AAAA+PTR', 'NS', 'SOA', 'MX', 'PTR', 'CNAME', 'PTR', 'TXT', 'SPF'
parameters.name: record_type

delete.summary: Delete a default record by id

put.description: You can use the wildcard placeholder DOMAIN in the 'name' parameter for the domain's name later, i.e. www.DOMAIN would become www.example.com for domain example.com.

get.description: Intended for testing only.  This endpoint simply calls the local update-data.sh script to force tinydns to update its data file so that dns queries can be tested immediately.  Used by integration tests.
get.summary: Force update of local tinydns data
